function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Data uncertainties leading to inaccurate transmission models","Impact":"Misguided public health interventions and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Regular validation of surveillance data, use of multiple data sources, and application of robust statistical modeling","Technologies":"Improved space-time statistical mapping approaches and mathematical transmission models","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health agencies and research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate prioritization of investigations and surveillance activities","Impact":"Failure to detect disease outbreaks and respond effectively","Mitigation":"Integration of rapid case-based risk mapping into a centralized online tool, dynamic updating of mapping based on new data, and inclusion of seasonal and interannual variations","Technologies":"Online mapping tools, data visualization software, and statistical analysis tools","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists, and researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies and research institutions"},{"Description":"Insufficient understanding of movement dynamics and demographics","Impact":"Ineffective control measures and containment strategies","Mitigation":"Integration of phone data with other movement data sources such as census, survey, and satellite data to inform movement dynamics, demographics, and cross-border data","Technologies":"Integration platforms for diverse data sources, spatial analysis software, and demographic modeling tools","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, and disease control specialists","Owner":"Public health agencies and research institutions"}]}
